Heading: Unspecified
Note: Status is not specified (as distinct from unknown): the default if the <MarketPublishingStatus> element is not sent

Heading: Cancelled
Note: The product was announced for publication in this market, and subsequently abandoned. A market publication date must not be sent

Heading: Forthcoming
Note: Not yet published in this market, should be accompanied by expected local publication date

Heading: Postponed indefinitely
Note: The product was announced for publication in this market, and subsequently postponed with no expected local publication date. A market publication date must not be sent

Heading: Active
Note: The product was published in this market, and is still active in the sense that the publisher will accept orders for it, though it may or may not be immediately available, for which see <SupplyDetail>

Heading: No longer our product
Note: Responsibility for the product in this market has been transferred elsewhere (with details of acquiring publisher representative in this market if possible in PR.25 (ONIX 2.1) OR P.25 (ONIX 3.0))

Heading: Out of stock indefinitely
Note: The product was active in this market, but is now inactive in the sense that (a) the publisher representative (local publisher or sales agent) cannot fulfill orders for it, though stock may still be available elsewhere in the supply chain, and (b) there are no current plans to bring it back into stock in this market. Code 06 does not specifically imply that returns are or are not still accepted

Heading: Out of print
Note: The product was active in this market, but is now permanently inactive in this market in the sense that (a) the publisher representative (local publisher or sales agent) will not accept orders for it, though stock may still be available elsewhere in the supply chain, and (b) the product will not be made available again in this market under the same ISBN. Code 07 normally implies that the publisher will not accept returns beyond a specified date

Heading: Inactive
Note: The product was active in this market, but is now permanently or indefinitely inactive in the sense that the publisher representative (local publisher or sales agent) will not accept orders for it, though stock may still be available elsewhere in the supply chain. Code 08 covers both of codes 06 and 07, and may be used where the distinction between those values is either unnecessary or meaningless

Heading: Unknown
Note: The sender of the ONIX record does not know the current publishing status in this market

Heading: Remaindered
Note: The product is no longer available in this market from the publisher representative (local publisher or sales agent), under the current ISBN, at the current price. It may be available to be traded through another channel, usually at a reduced price

Heading: Withdrawn from sale
Note: Withdrawn from sale in this market, typically for legal reasons or to avoid giving offence

Heading: Not available in this market
Note: Either no rights are held for the product in this market, or for other reasons the publisher has decided not to make it available in this market

Heading: Active, but not sold separately
Note: The product is published in this market and active but, as a publishing decision, it is not sold separately – only in an assembly or as part of a package. Depending on product composition and pricing, it may be saleable separately at retail

Heading: Active, with market restrictions
Note: The product is published in this market and active, but is not available to all customer types, typically because the market is split between exclusive sales agents for different market segments. In ONIX 2.1, should be accompanied by a free-text statement in <MarketRestrictionDetail> describing the nature of the restriction. In ONIX 3.0, the <SalesRestriction> composite in Group P.24 should be used

Heading: Recalled
Note: Recalled in this market for reasons of consumer safety

Heading: Temporarily withdrawn from sale
Note: Temporarily withdrawn from sale in this market, typically for quality or technical reasons. In ONIX 3.0, must be accompanied by expected availability date coded ‘22’ within the <MarketDate> composite, except in exceptional circumstances where no date is known
